description: The official car of 'I just need something that runs.' This economy coupe is front-wheel drive, underpowered, and completely forgettable — which is exactly why there are hundreds of them at The Pit. Cheap to buy, cheap to fix, and a blank canvas for a first build.
lore: You'll see a dozen of these in any college parking lot in Nova Pacifica. The Campus Coupe is the default first car — nothing special, nothing broken. At The Pit, they're cannon fodder, but a few dedicated builders have turned them into legitimate threats.
